question: Can I perform kaza if I missed magrib salaah?
answer:
QUESTION
If I miss the magrib salaah,can I perform kaza? If I can perform kaza when can it be done.
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to perform any Salaat, Adaa and Qadhaa, at sunrise, midday and sunset.

It is also not permissible to perform any Qadhaa Salaat after Asr when the sun has lost its glow.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
